name: l'appel du vide (MoonShot Group)
description:
あimeriez-vous prendre un 飲mimono? Ou, peut-être, une スラッshu? Oh, désolé, nous n'avons plus de  スラッshu. ごめnnasaい.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

l'appel du vide is a game about, well, nothing, really. Stroll around Le Vide and take in.. whatever this all is.

This was created in 48 hours to test various shaders and networking capabilities. No guarantees that anything will come of it, but we hope you enjoy your time in Le Vide.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits

Programming by Brian Maresso
Props by Emily Garczynski
World design by Brandon W. Hanabarger

This game features music from LUXURY ELITE, 猫 シ Corp., glaciære, and 식료품groceries, as well as ambient sounds by deathicated.
